title: IDFC First Bank | Application Engineer | Bangalore
content:

Details: Got an offer from college placements itself. Had an online assessment round along with 1 technical and 1 technical + hr round

title: Amazon |SDE 2|

Taken pep from salesforce after given option for pip/pep
Now enjoying 15 days paid vacation
